Marvel Quiz App How well do you know your Marvel superheroes? Question 1 Who is Captain America\'s archenemy? Question 2 Which two of the following superheroes are not part of Netflix\'s The Defenders? Question 3 Who is the Sentry\'s alter ego? Question 4 Who is the leader of the Inhumans? Question 5 Who is Iron Man\'s on/off girlfriend? Question 6 Is Eddie Brock Spiderman> Question 7 Which superhero is Tony Stark? Question 8 Who is Thor\'s half brother?
